author.name: Madan Narra
author.description:
Madan is a software developer, writer, and ex-failed-startup co-founder.
He has over 10+ years of experience building scalable and distributed systems using Java, JavaScript, Node.js. He writes about software design and architecture best practices with Java and is especially passionate about Microservices, API Development, Distributed Applications and Frontend Technologies.
